title: Why do we stop at a red traffic light? New research framework seeks to answer ...
text: ( Source : Universiteit van Amsterdam ) 19 October 2015 â€‹An accelerating driver who suddenly brakes because a traffic light changes to red is an example of response inhibition, or the interruption of an on-going action. The question is which
